params.name: credentials
params.description: JSON document containing service account credentials.

params.name: spreadsheetTitle
params.description: Title of a new spreadsheet. Default is "Untitled spreadsheet".

params.name: sheetTitle
params.description: The name of a new sheet. Default is "Sheet1".

params.name: authorizedUsers
params.description: Grant writer permissions to the list of passed email addresses on the created spreadsheet.

params.name: credentials
params.description: JSON document containing service account credentials.

params.name: spreadsheetUrl
params.description: URL of the spreadsheet, to add the sheet to.

params.name: sheetTitle
params.description: The name of the sheet. Default is "Sheet1".

params.name: credentials
params.description: JSON document containing service account credentials.

params.name: spreadsheetUrl
params.description: URL of the spreadsheet.

params.name: sheetTitle
params.description: Title of the target sheet.

params.name: data
params.description: Data to be inserted, each line represents one cell.

params.name: row
params.description: Number of the row to insert the data at.

params.name: credentials
params.description: JSON document containing service account credentials.

params.name: spreadsheetUrl
params.description: URL of the spreadsheet.

params.name: sharing
params.description: Sharing setting for the spreadsheet.

params.name: viewers
params.description: List of email addresses, one email address per line. This option will only be valid if chosen Sharing is Restricted.

params.name: commenters
params.description: List of email addresses, one email address per line. This option will only be valid if chosen Sharing is Restricted.

params.name: editors
params.description: List of email addresses, one email address per line. This option will only be valid if chosen Sharing is Restricted.

params.name: notifyMessage
params.description: Notification message to send to the granted email addresses.
params.placeholder: You have access now to this spreadsheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1OIu0_tNKDrys4T3CtqJCZ4_TEg1HYJOI86ywgU3JGIe.

params.name: overwrite
params.description: Overwrite all existing access rights on the spreadsheet.
